name: Sheepish (Vespukki)
description:
Small prototype to see what works, what can be improved and what needs to change.

The art (except for the poorly drawn fish) was done by sketchy_outline! You can watch him draw here

the game gets pretty low frames sometimes in browser so download it if you are having frame troubles

if you go back and forth through doors really quick you can break the game also so be wary of that
